Package org.graffiti.selection

Class SelectionModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.graffiti.selection.SelectionModel
  • public class SelectionModel
extends Object
    Contains a list of selections and a reference to the current selection.
    Version:
    $Revision: 1.9 $
    Author:
    flierl
